ca.ualberta.team2recipefinder.model

Class Recipe

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.team2recipefinder.model.Model<View>
      • ca.ualberta.team2recipefinder.model.Recipe
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Recipe
extends Model<View>
implements java.io.Serializable
    Recipe Class: This class represents our recipe objects. All recipes have a Name, Procedure, Ingredient List, and Author. The class is able to set and get any of these attributes.
    Author:
    CMPUT 301 Team 2
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
